Texts.Eng: Here you go, Captain. This shield is starting to come together quite well!

The shield generator is still in pristine condition, but all of the connections were fried, and there's no power source for the shield. ^green;Find me ^orange;8 pieces of Centensian Tech^green; and ^orange;16 pieces of Centensian Metal^reset;, and I should be able to build a functional casing for the generator.
